definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: She. had been smothered with her coat.
sentences.chinese: 歹徒用她的衣服使她窒息而死。

sentences.english: One of his colleagues was murdered 11 years ago by Guangdong gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 他的一個同事11年前被廣東的歹徒謀殺。

sentences.english: Some local ruffians are responsible for this.
sentences.chinese: 某些當地歹徒應負此責。

sentences.english: The thugs jumped him in a dark alley.
sentences.chinese: 在黑巷裏歹徒們突然攻擊他。

sentences.english: The police crept up from behind and took the gangster by surprise.
sentences.chinese: 警察悄悄從背後繞過去，出其不意地將歹徒逮捕。

sentences.english: Four hostiles are on the main floor.
Muggers often assault their victims on dark streets.
sentences.chinese: 歹徒時常在黑暗的街道上攻擊被害者。

sentences.english: The rogues were satisfied with her bale up.
sentences.chinese: 歹徒們見她把錢立刻交了出來，便滿足了。

sentences.english: The brave policeman is fighting hand to hand with the ruffian.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的警察正在與那個歹徒博鬥。

sentences.english: Every member of the gang has a price on his head.
sentences.chinese: 這幫歹徒每個人都被懸賞通輯。

sentences.english: The thug grappled him around the neck.
sentences.chinese: 那歹徒從頸後把他抓住。

sentences.english: When the ruffians attacked him, he laid about them vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 當歹徒攻擊他時，他奮勇地跟他們搏鬥。

sentences.english: They planned to bump off the mobster.
A woman was punched unconscious by two muggers in a street this afternoon. ;
sentences.chinese: 一個婦女今天下午在大街上被兩個歹徒打得失去知覺。

definition: violent crime/to commit a violent act (assault or murder)
